public ref class BasePartialCachingControl abstract : System::Web::UI::Control

summary.span: 为 和 类提供基本功能。

span.span: Provides the base functionality for the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示在编程方案中启用了输出缓存的用户控件。The class represents a user control that has output caching enabled in programmatic scenarios. ASP.NET 提供了几种为控件启用输出缓存的方法。ASP.NET provides several ways to enable output caching for a control. 以下列表描述了可用于启用输出缓存的方法：The following list describes methods you can use to enable output caching: - 使用 `@ OutputCache` 指令启用声明性方案中的输出缓存。Use the `@ OutputCache` directive to enable output caching in declarative scenarios. - 使用 类为代码隐藏文件中的用户控件启用缓存。Use the class to enable caching for a user control in a code-behind file. - 在使用 实例的编程方案中，使用类指定缓存设置 。Use the class to specify cache settings in programmatic scenarios in which you are working with instances. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建对类的引用 ，并将其设置为属性的值 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a reference to the class and sets it to the value of the property. 然后，该代码将 属性设置为 对象，该对象使控件依赖于文本文件。The code then sets the property to a object that makes the control dependent on a text file. [!code-csharp[BasePartialCachingControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BasePartialCachingControl/CS/dep1cs.ascx#1)] [!code-vb[BasePartialCachingControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BasePartialCachingControl/VB/dep1vb.ascx#1)]

summary.span: 获取与预包装用户控件关联的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the wrapped user control.

value.span: 一个 ，存储与预包装用户控件的输出缓存相关的属性。

span.span: A that stores output caching-related properties of the wrapped user control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许以编程方式访问 与实例中包含的用户控件关联的对象 。The property enables programmatic access to the object associated with the user control contained by the instance. 对象可通过编程方式进行操作，以影响用户控件的缓存行为和设置。The object can be programmatically manipulated to influence a user control's caching behavior and settings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在运行时动态加载用户控件并以编程方式进行操作。The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time. 此示例包含三个部分：This example has three parts: - 一个分部类， `LogOnControl` 它继承自 基类并 应用该特性。A partial class, `LogOnControl`, that inherits from the base class and to which the attribute is applied. - 与分部类一起使用的用户控件 `LogOnControl` 。A user control that is used with the `LogOnControl` partial class. - 承载用户控件的 Web 窗体页。A Web Forms page that hosts the user control. 若要成功运行此示例，请确保用户控件文件 ( .ascx) 、其代码隐藏文件 ( .cs 或 .vb) 以及承载用户控件的 Web 窗体页 ( 位于同一目录中。To run this example successfully, make sure the user control file (.ascx), its code-behind file (.cs or .vb), and the Web Forms page that hosts the user control (.aspx) are in the same directory. 该示例的第一部分演示如何 将应用于名为的用户控件 `LogOnControl` ，这意味着用户控件 在运行时由控件包装。The first part of the example demonstrates how the is applied to a user control named `LogOnControl`, which means the user control is wrapped by a control at run time. `LogOnControl`对象的缓存设置可以通过其关联的对象以编程方式进行操作，可通过对包装该对象 的进行引用 。The `LogOnControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated object, which is available through a reference to the that wraps it. 在此示例中，缓存设置在页初始化期间进行检查，并在满足某些条件时进行更改。In this example, caching settings are examined during page initialization and changed if some conditions are met. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/CS/LogonControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/VB/logoncontrol.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示了一个用户控件，该控件与上一示例一起用于演示用户控件缓存。The second part of the example shows a user control that is used with the previous example to demonstrate user control caching. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/CS/Logonformcs.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/VB/Logonformvb.ascx#3)] 该示例的第三部分演示如何在 `LogOnControl` Web 窗体页中使用用户控件。The third part of the example demonstrates using the `LogOnControl` user control from a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/CS/controlcachepolicy_loadcontrolcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/VB/controlcachepolicy_loadcontrolvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与缓存的用户控件输出关联的 类的实例。

span.span: Gets or sets an instance of the class associated with the cached user control output.
The associated with the server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当关联的缓存依赖项发生更改时，此属性允许您从输出缓存中删除用户控件输出。This property allows you to remove user control output from the output cache when the associated cache dependency changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性设置 为 对象，该对象使控件依赖于文本文件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to a object that makes the control dependent on a text file. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[BasePartialCachingControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BasePartialCachingControl/CS/dep1cs.ascx#2)] [!code-vb[BasePartialCachingControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BasePartialCachingControl/VB/dep1vb.ascx#2)]
